Text: Ken Nice to see you again this morning in the lobby Its always a pleasure to enjoy your courtesy Three years ago you helped me get into Enron I am still immensely grateful It has been a fabulous experience Now Azurix is releasing me my last day is DEC Im looking for a new position at Enron Barring that I take a standard severance package on JAN and go overboard Im taking the typical aggressive Enron approach to networking so if you are aware of something Id appreciate knowing Ill be over to see Stan Horton this afternoon at Ive continued to hone my skills and provide leadership and creativity in difficult circumstances I know Enron is changing Im willing to change and learn with it Theres a lot I can do for Enron Id just like to have a shot at it Hope the holidays are joyous and safe for you and Linda and your entire family Best regards J Paul
